About the Company: Sanghvi Forging & Engineering Limited (SFEL) is the manufacturer of various forging and machined components for Process & Heavy Industrial application.Since its commencement in 1989, SFEL has achieved several milestones and is amongst leading forging suppliers for the Core Sector in various grades of steel. Company is recognized by reputed customers and Inspection Agencies for its quality products. Company has always focused on state of the art technology for delivering better products year after year.
